In a vibrant forest, a speedy hare boasted about his racing skills, challenging anyone to compete. A slow-moving snail named Sammy, tired of being overlooked, accepted the challenge. The day of the race arrived, and the animals gathered, chuckling at Sammy's audacity. As the race began, the hare sprinted ahead, confident of victory. But halfway through, he decided to nap, thinking he had plenty of time. Meanwhile, Sammy, with determination, steadily inched forward. When the hare woke up, he dashed to the finish line, only to find Sammy had crossed it first. The crowd erupted in cheers, proving that persistence beats speed.
